TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlObjectWriterSettings extends System.Xaml.XamlWriterSettings

summary.span: 提供 的特定 XAML 寫入器設定。

span.span: Provides specific XAML writer settings for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以函式內指定。A can function within specified . 未指定設定、 執行個體存在於具有預設值的建構，和此執行個體可以在 合併的設定用於衍生的類別。Where settings are not specified, an instance of exists that has default values for a constructed , and this instance can be used in merges of settings for a derived class.

summary.span: 取得或設定當 為 時，用於從 XAML 寫入器註冊名稱的名稱範圍。

span.span: Gets or sets the XAML namescope to use for registering names from the XAML writer if is .

value.span: 用於註冊名稱的 XAML 名稱範圍。

span.span: The XAML namescope to use for registering names.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特定內容可能會使用外部的 XAML 名稱範圍。Specific contexts for a might use an external XAML namescope. ## WPF 使用注意事項WPF Usage Notes 在 WPF XAML 實作中，XAML 寫入器作業所起始的指定不同的 XAML 名稱範圍。In the WPF XAML implementation, XAML writer operations that are initiated by specify a separate XAML namescope. WPF 本例中，範本不應共用的 XAML 名稱範圍與它們定義的 XAML 頁面根。In this WPF scenario, templates should not share a XAML namescope with the root of the XAML page that defines them. 相反地，它們應該處理到另一個指定的 XAML 名稱範圍。Instead, they should process into a separate, designated XAML namescope.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定 XAML 寫入器是否應該在有型別轉換器的情況下忽略 (而不要呼叫) 上的 實作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the XAML writer should ignore (not call) implementations on a in type-converter situations.

value.span: 如果 XAML 寫入器會忽略 實作則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the XAML writer ignores implementations; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和其方法是在 CLR 中的類型轉換的整體設計的一部分。The class and its method are part of an overall design for type conversion in the CLR. 在 XAML 系統中，您通常可以假設類型轉換器輸入，識別由 XAML 讀取器和輸入的目的，永遠是字串。In XAML systems, you can typically assume that type-converter input is identifiable by the XAML reader, and for purposes of input, is always a string. 如果您將這個屬性設定為`true`，啟用這項假設編寫的 XAML 物件寫入器行為的其中一個模式。If you set this property to `true`, you enable a mode where this assumption is codified in the XAML object writer behavior. 此模式支援舊版的 WPF XAML 的相容性需求。This mode supports a compatibility requirement for previous versions of WPF XAML.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值決定是否要停用會在寫入物件圖形表示之前對 的 元件執行型別轉換的預設 功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to disable a default feature that runs type conversion on the component of a before writing the object graph representation.

value.span: 如果要停用 物件的 型別轉換，則為 。

span.span: if type conversion for a object should be disabled.

value.span: 如果要為適用的 物件執行 型別轉換，則為 。

span.span: if performing type conversion for a object applies.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊`K`類型轉換功能，請參閱 < 備註 > 中的。For more information about the `K` type conversion feature, see Remarks in .

summary.span: 取得或設定 作業的既有根物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a preexisting root object for operations.
A preexisting root object for operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將此值時，根物件執行個體做為隱含（具有物件直接而不是來自讀取器的輸入） 的呼叫之前的第一次的明確節點寫入呼叫。If you set this value, the root object instance is used as an implicit call (with object input that is direct instead of coming from the reader) that precedes the first explicit node-write call by the . 任何錯誤檢查，例如驗證提供的根物件，XAML 型別必須等到也隱含呼叫，而不是要檢查當您設定此設定的屬性。Any error checking, such as verifying the XAML type of the provided root object, is deferred until that implicit call, instead of being checked when you set this settings property.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the XAML writer omits to check for the code path that checks for duplicate properties.

value.span: 如果應省略重複屬性檢查則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the duplicate property check should be omitted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的程式碼路徑會檢查目前指派的屬性，並擲回例外狀況，如果嘗試重複的屬性集的具名環境屬性。The specified code path checks the currently assigned properties and throws an exception if a duplicate property set of the named ambient property is attempted. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件處理常式以泛型為基礎使用的委派事件資料。The event handler is based on the generic delegate that uses the event data.
